greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(n) = A254104(A048673(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = a(2n)/2. [Even bisection halved gives back the sequence itself.]
A254117(n) = (a((2*n)+1) - 1)/2. [Likewise, the odd bisection induces A254117.]
program: return 1 if n==1 else (1 + reduce(mul, [nextprime(i)**f[i] for i in f]))/2
def a(n): return a254104(a048673(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 06 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 04 2015
